title: Flash FX Pack
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 12 Flash FX sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/co7LDF3kF3E


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Element 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Element 02_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Element 03_#[512,288].png 3072x2304

● Element 04_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Element 05_#[512,288].png 1536x1440

● Element 06_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Element 07_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Element 08_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Element 09_#[512,288].png 2048x1296

● Element 10_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Element 11_#[512,288].png 2048x1728

● Element 12_#[512,288].png 2048x1440


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
